articles.title: Spain: Women's football coaching staff resign over kissing scandal - Euronews
articles.description: All of Spain's national women's football coaching staff except for the chief have stepped down after RFEF president Luis Rubiales kissed player Jenni Hermoso on the lips after her team's victory in the World Cup final.

articles.description: Astronomers have found the most magnetic star. The giant magnetic helium star is 3,000 light years away and looks nothing like helium stars in our universe.
